Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_view

Interface GameViewClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameViewCLI, GameViewGUI
public interface GameViewClient

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    GameViewClient.InputStateMachine
    Class representing all the possible states of the FSM which handles the game phase client-side.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    askDeck(Object availableDecks)
    Updates the UI with the available decks the user can choose.
    void
    askGameType()
    Updates the UI to let the user choose the game type.
    void
    askJoiningAction()
    Makes the user choose what to do when he connects to the server, whether to create a new game or joining an existing one.
    void
    askLobbyToJoin(Object listOfLobbyInfos)
    Makes the user choose which lobby to join by listing all the possible ones with their respective information.
    void
    askName()
    Make the client choose his nickname.
    void
    askPlayerNumber()
    Makes the user choose the number of players during the game creation, by setting up properly the UI.
    void
    displayEndGame(CommunicationMessage.MessageType condition)
    Displays the end of the game.
    void
    displayErrorMessage(String errorMsg, String errorType, GameBoard boardToUpdate)
    Display error message in game board
    void
    displayExpertMode()
    Displays that the game is played in expert mode.
    void
    displayIsChoosingDeckType(Object playerNameWhoIsChosingTheDeck)
    Displays the player who is currently choosing the deck
    void
    displayLobbyJoined(Object lobbyInfos)
    Displays the joined lobby and the players in it.
    void
    displayNoLobbiesAvailable()
    Display an error message when a player wants to join a lobby but no lobbies have been created yet.
    void
    displayNotYourTurn()
    Displays on the game, 'not your turn' string.
    void
    displayOtherPlayerTurn(String otherPlayerName)
    Displays a message indicating that it is another player turn, by specifying the nickname of the player who is playing.
    void
    displayYourTurn()
    Displays the user that it is his turn.
    void
    gameReady(GameBoard board)
    Function called when the game is ready to start.
    GameBoard
    getBoard()
    Returns the current game board.
    Client
    getClient()
    Returns the client associated to this interface.
    void
    onPlayerDisconnection(String playerWhoMadeTheLobbyClose)
    Function called when a player disconnects from the lobby.
    void
    reaskAssistant()
    Notifies the user that the assistant played was already played by someone else in the same turn and asks him to play another one.
    void
    reaskName()
    In case of errors while picking the name (nickname already taken or invalid nickname chosen), makes the client choose again the nickname.
    void
    setBoard(GameBoard board)
    Given a new board, coming from the server, sets it as the current board.
    void
    updateBoard(GameBoard board)
    Updates the entire board in the UI.

  • Method Details

    • displayErrorMessage

      void displayErrorMessage(String errorMsg, String errorType, GameBoard boardToUpdate)
      Display error message in game board
      Parameters:
      errorMsg - string containing the error message
      errorType - String containing the type of error
      boardToUpdate - the Game board to get the player at which the error message is showed

    • updateBoard

      void updateBoard(GameBoard board)
      Updates the entire board in the UI.
      Parameters:
      board - the board containing the update

    • displayYourTurn

      void displayYourTurn()
      Displays the user that it is his turn.

    • displayNotYourTurn

      void displayNotYourTurn()
      Displays on the game, 'not your turn' string.

    • displayOtherPlayerTurn

      void displayOtherPlayerTurn(String otherPlayerName)
      Displays a message indicating that it is another player turn, by specifying the nickname of the player who is playing.
      Parameters:
      otherPlayerName - the nickname of the player who is playing.

    • displayExpertMode

      void displayExpertMode()
      Displays that the game is played in expert mode.

    • askName

      void askName()
      Make the client choose his nickname.

    • reaskName

      void reaskName()
      In case of errors while picking the name (nickname already taken or invalid nickname chosen), makes the client choose again the nickname.

    • displayIsChoosingDeckType

      void displayIsChoosingDeckType(Object playerNameWhoIsChosingTheDeck)
      Displays the player who is currently choosing the deck
      Parameters:
      playerNameWhoIsChosingTheDeck - the name of the player which is choosing the deck

    • askDeck

      void askDeck(Object availableDecks)
      Updates the UI with the available decks the user can choose.
      Parameters:
      availableDecks - the available decks.

    • askGameType

      void askGameType()
      Updates the UI to let the user choose the game type.

    • askJoiningAction

      void askJoiningAction()
      Makes the user choose what to do when he connects to the server, whether to create a new game or joining an existing one.

    • displayNoLobbiesAvailable

      void displayNoLobbiesAvailable()
      Display an error message when a player wants to join a lobby but no lobbies have been created yet.

    • askLobbyToJoin

      void askLobbyToJoin(Object listOfLobbyInfos)
      Makes the user choose which lobby to join by listing all the possible ones with their respective information.
      Parameters:
      listOfLobbyInfos - list of lobbies infos of the lobbies currently open in the server.

    • displayLobbyJoined

      void displayLobbyJoined(Object lobbyInfos)
      Displays the joined lobby and the players in it.
      Parameters:
      lobbyInfos - info about the lobby.

    • askPlayerNumber

      void askPlayerNumber()
      Makes the user choose the number of players during the game creation, by setting up properly the UI.

    • gameReady

      void gameReady(GameBoard board)
      Function called when the game is ready to start. The board is shown and the match begins.
      Parameters:
      board - first board update received

    • reaskAssistant

      void reaskAssistant()
      Notifies the user that the assistant played was already played by someone else in the same turn and asks him to play another one.

    • onPlayerDisconnection

      void onPlayerDisconnection(String playerWhoMadeTheLobbyClose)
      Function called when a player disconnects from the lobby. The client's app gets closed by displaying an error message.
      Parameters:
      playerWhoMadeTheLobbyClose - the name of the player that disconnected and so killed the lobby

    • getBoard

      GameBoard getBoard()
      Returns the current game board.
      Returns:
      the current game board.

    • setBoard

      void setBoard(GameBoard board)
      Given a new board, coming from the server, sets it as the current board.
      Parameters:
      board - the new board to set up.
      See Also:
      • GameBoard

    • getClient

      Client getClient()
      Returns the client associated to this interface.
      Returns:
      the client associated to this interface.
      See Also:
      • Client

    • displayEndGame

      void displayEndGame(CommunicationMessage.MessageType condition)
      Displays the end of the game.
      Parameters:
      condition - end game condition (could be WIN, LOSE, DRAW).
